name: shabti soldier

specials.name: Sword Master
specials.description: Reedreaper has weapon specialization (adding an additional +2 to all damage rolls) and weapon mastery in bladed weapons (gaining the benefits of the blade critical effect).

specials.name: Quick Reversal
specials.description:
Requirements You are flanked by at least two enemies.
You turn your foes’ flanking against them with a quick reverse. Make a melee Strike against one of the flanking enemies and make a second Strike with the same weapon or unarmed attack against a different enemy that is flanking you. This second Strike has the same multiple attack penalty of the initial attack and doesn’t count toward your multiple attack penalty.

specials.name: Immortal
specials.description: Immune to spells and effects that cause aging.

specials.name: Kip Up
specials.description: Standing up from prone does not provoke reactions.

specials.name: Advanced Shield Block
specials.description: (hardness 5, hp 20 (bt 10) In addition to the normal effects of this ability reedreaper may choose to raise his shield as a reaction rather than shield block, use his shield to defend an ally rather than himself or may immediately throw back a creature that strikes his shield either automatically Shoving it 5 feet or causing it to become flat-footed until the start of his next turn. The triggering creature chooses whether to be moved or become flat-footed. If it chooses to be moved, you choose the direction. If the Shove would cause it to hit a solid object, enter a square of difficult terrain, or enter another creature’s space, it must become flat-footed instead of being moved.
